General.Name: Jiangxi Black Cat Carbon Black
General.Description: Jiangxi Black Cat Carbon Black Inc.,Ltd engages in the production and sale of carbon black products in China. It offers carbon black for rubber, specialty carbon black, green carbon black, precipitated and fumed silica, and chemical products. It also provides tar refining and white carbon black products. The company was founded in 2001 and is based in Jingdezhen, China.

2.Name: Mr. Yi  Li
2.Title: Deputy GM, Sec. of the Board & Non Independent Director
